\bigskip

1. How many digits does $N=1234567891011121314...9998999910000$ have, where $N$ is formed by concatenating $1,2,3,\ldots,9999,10000$? (_Hint_: you might want to look up the functions \texttt{nchar(), as.character(), paste()})

\medskip

2. Compute
$$1^2+2^2+3^2+\cdots+99^2+100^2$$

```{r, echo = F, eval = F}
vec_char <- as.character(1:10000) # to use paste, turn numeric to character
vec_collapse <- paste(string, collapse = "")
print(nchar(vec_collapse))
```
